How Automated ML is Transforming the Predictive Analytics Landscape

Previous post
Next post

 
  http likes 52
Tags: Automated Data Science, Automated Machine Learning, DataRobot, Predictive Analytics

Learn how DataRobot automates predictive modeling, and how our platform can deliver these same types of insights and a substantial productivity boost to your machine learning endeavors, on Tuesday, May 2nd at 1:00 pm ET.


                                                     
How Automated Machine Learning is Transforming the Predictive Analytics Landscape
Presented by DataRobot - includes Live Demo
Learn how DataRobot automates predictive modeling, and how our platform can deliver these same types of insights and a substantial productivity boost to your machine learning endeavors. 

Organizations around the world are producing accurate data-based predictions and benefiting from insightful analysis in a fraction of the time required by conventional tools and methods. This is the power of machine learning. In this webinar, learn how DataRobot automates predictive modeling, and how our platform can deliver these same types of insights and a substantial productivity boost to your machine learning endeavors. 

Built for speed and scalability, DataRobot radically reduces the time required to complete a data science project. From data to deployment, with DataRobot you can bring products to market faster, react quickly to rapidly changing market conditions, and speed the transformation of your business. 

In this 45-minute webinar demoing DataRobot in action, you will learn how the DataRobot automated machine learning platform:
• enables data scientists and analysts to quickly build highly accurate predictive models using an automated machine learning workflow
• provides the flexibility to customize, as well as generate, deep insights using modern open-source algorithms
• helps teams easily deploy models in production and deliver immediate value to business
Join Gourab De, VP of Data Science Practice at DataRobot, on Tuesday, May 2nd at 1:00 pm ET to see DataRobot in action!
Event details Register Here
Tuesday, May 2, 2017
1:00 pm ET / 10:00 am PT
